itunes:title: Dear Jessi & Stew...
title: Dear Jessi & Stew...
description: We're taking it back to the time where you could write into your trusty pals Abby and Ann for advice on life's toughest situations and dropping unsolicited advice for work, life, and everything in between. But unlike real-life twin sisters and advice column rivals "Dear Abby" and "Ask Ann Landers," we're putting our heads together to bring you the best of both of our combined experiences and dropping it on you like it's HOT!
content:encoded: We're taking it back to the time where you could write into your trusty pals Abby and Ann for advice on life's toughest situations and dropping unsolicited advice for work, life, and everything in between. But unlike real-life twin sisters and advice column rivals "Dear Abby" and "Ask Ann Landers," we're putting our heads together to bring you the best of both of our combined experiences and dropping it on you like it's HOT!
itunes:author: JZ Styles
